pasku praha­raya hamuwe yaha palana rajaye aara­kshaka durwa­latha gana dan mulu ratama wiwidha jana­madhya osse wika­sha­naya wana jana­dhi­pathi pari­ksha­naya osse karunu wataha gani­min siti- dahas ganan oththu sewa wartha ha aara­kshaka mandala wartha thulin wiwidha wara ganan wala yaha­pa­lana rajaye waga­kiwa yuthu nila­dha­rinta waga­kiwa yuthu desha­pa­lana naya­ka­thwa­yata danum di thibu­nath owun eyata kisidu sarthaka aara­kshitha wada pili­we­lak noye­dima hethu­wen siduwu ahin­saka manussa ghathana sankhya­wata ema yaha­pa­lana rajaya sruju­wama waga kiwa yuthuyi.

winisuru mak pranandu 1977 sita thamunta awashya aakarayata uparimadhikaranayata winishchayakaruwan path kirimata janadhipathiwarayata balaya labima ehi swadhinathwayata barapathala paharak wiya. 19 wana wyawastha sanshodhanaya thulin yam thak aakarayata adhikaranaye swadhinathwayak athikirimata uthsaha kalada, eyada sahimakata path wiya haki aakarayakin pawathiyayi wishwasa kala nohaka.

sawikara aththe mage birida daruwan gnyathin, game sama ayekuma menma apa rate sama ayekugema prayojanaya sadahaya.esema wasara kihipayak pura nirogi wu kihipa denaku menma kangan jalaya saha ayanikarakaya pilibadawa hodin awabhodhaya labagath pasuwa palamuwena web pituwa menma wishwa koshayatada athulath kara sinhala bhashawen kangan jala chikithsawa namin pothakda nirmanaya karana ladde rogin wena mahajanathawage prayojanaya sadahaya.me pilibadawa thawath thorathura danaganimata ho kangan ayanikarakayan miladi ganimata adahas karanne nam durakathana anka 0718669451 saha 0332262409 yana ankayan amatha laba ganna menda,thama gnyathin asalwasiyan menma thama du daruwange menma anagatha daru parapura rogi bawen mudawa ganima sadaha katayuthu karana menda danwa sitimi.kangan jala chikithsawa potha miladi ganima sadaha ihatha durakathana ankayan amathanna.
hethuwa nam "mage duwe oba awadiyen nam" githaye men mema githaye me wisthara karana sundarathwaya windimata awakashayak kisiwekuta nohaki wimayi.

ardha pelegiyanuwadaya mulikama papaya minis sanhathiya dushanayata path kala athayi pawasuwath eeth samaharu eya pawasanne dewiyan wahansege karunawath samaga sahabhagikam nodarimata yana simawa nomathi bawaya.

siyaluma disthrikka aawaranaya wana paridi idikirimata yojitha krida sankirna wyapruthiya yatathe labana wasara muladi pradhana disthrikka 5ka krida sankirna idikirima aarambha karana bawa krida amathyanshaye lekam udaya senewirathna mahatha pawasiya.kridawa diyunu kirima sandaha rajya ayawaya yojana thulin di athi ilakka ha 2012 krida amathyanshaye salasum sahagatha karyabharaya idiripath kirime madhya hamuwedi ee mahatha ese pawasiya.ehidi wadi duratath adahas dakwu senewirathna mahatha yojitha krida sankirna wyapruthiyedi gampaha, kaluthara, rathnapura, mathara ha madakalapuwa krida sankirna labana wasara muladi aarambha karana bawa pawasiya.me magin ee ee disthrikkawalata anga sampurna krida sankirnayak labena athara eeta mitar 400 dhawana pathayak, puhunu dhawana pathayak, mitar 50 pihinum thatakayak, gruhastha kridagarayak, aapana shalawak ha bhojanagarayak ha pe්rakshakagarayak athulath weyi.kolambaa idikala hoki ha ragar kridangana labana wasare wada nimakaramin bhara dena bawin kolambaa nagaraya anga sampurna jathyanthara krida kalapayak bawata pathkirimata da balaporoththu wana bawa senewirathna mahatha pawasiya.pasugiya kalaye kriyathmaka wu krida shakthi wadasatahana ‘lowa dinana krida shakthi’ wada satahana namin kriyathmaka wana bawath ee thulin kridakayanta laba dun dimanawa rupiyal 1000 sita rupiyal 2500 dakwa wadi kirimata katayuthu yoda athi bawath ee mahatha pawasiya.wadi duratath adahas dakwu senewirathna mahatha pasugiya wasare shri lanka krida keshthrayata kalu pallamak wu thahanam uththejaka bhawithaya krida keshthrayen thuran kirimata wishesha wadapiliwelak krida waidya eekakaya sambandha karagena kriyathmaka kirimata balaporoththu wana bawa kiya.

namuth pasukalinawa aagamika pathapotha bahula wima, rupawahiniya, rakiyawan sandaha madaperadigata piwisima thulin ehi jiwana kramaya nirikshanaya kirimata awasthawa udawima, antharjalaya wani karunu hethuwen siya aagamehi mulika prathipaththin pilibandawa owunhata mana danumak ha awabodhayak athiwuni.

rudhiraye sini mattama ihala giyama muthra ekka glukos pita wenda patan gannawa.muthrawala diyawela thiyena drawya pramanaya wadi wenakota ee drawyath ekka wadi wathura pramanayakuth muthra widihata pita wela yanawa.ee kiyanne wadi muthra parimawak dawasakata pita wenawa.dawal dawase ki parak muthra kalada kiyala kenekuta mathaka hitinne na.namuth rata deparakata wada ninden nagitala muthra karanda yanda wenawanan onna poddak salakilimath wena eka hondayi.ee wagema adhika lesa muthra pita wima nisa wagema rudhiraye glukos adhika wima nisa rudhiraye athi drawya pramanaya wadi wima nisa me pudgalayinta thibaha danenawath wadi.ee wagema insiyulinwalin meda patakaye meda thanpath wima uththejanaya karanawa wagema meda patakayen meda nawatha rudhirayata muda harima walakwana namuth me ayage shariraye insiyulin hariyata wada karanne nathi hinda me aya kettu wendath patan gannawa.ee wagema rudhiraye kochchara glukos thibbath eewa saila athulata ganda nam insiyulin hariyata wada karanda oone hinda saila nitharama inne bada ginne.ee nisa me saila molayata paniwida yawanawa eyalata kama na kiyala.eeka hinda molaya pudgalayata badaginna athi karanda katayuthu karanawa.

motar ratha magi simawa: 'hawul prawahanaye' athul paththa "waradi walakwanna riyadurange mola sudda karanna" podu prawahana sewawala lingika hinsanayata erehiwa polisiya anek pa්rawahana kandawala rathawahana 21,927 kin magi pahasukam salasi aththe 32,891 pirisakata pamanak wana bawin bas ratha sandaha menma pasal, saha rakiya katayuthu sandaha bhawitha karana podu pa්rawahana sewaya wenuwen pa්ramukhatha manthiru widhimathwa handunwa denne nam in kalaya menma marga thadabadaya da salakiya yuthu pa්ramanayakin awama kara gatha haki bawath wyapruthi warthawen awadharanaya kara thibe.
